Room.Name: Copper Pits - Mounted on a Dragon
Room.ShortDescription: You are mounted atop a copper dragon, in the second level of the pits.
Room.LongDescription: There is a light leather harness, securely fastened to a saddle , and a gleaming lance set in its socket at your side. On the other side of you is a saddle bag and a small shield. Mounted on the saddle pummel is a direction indicator. Right now, it reads: 0.0.0.0.0
